content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
One of the highest-rated action games is back and better than ever. Experience a new way to play Ninja Gaiden® Sigma with motion & touch controls, tons of content, and new challenges to test even the toughest ninja.

For centuries, the Dragon Ninjas have protected the world and kept safe the most powerful weapons--the Dark Dragon Blade and the Dragon Sword. But now, a powerful evil arise who will test the might of the ninjas. Take Dragon Sword in hand as the young Ryu Hayabusa, and journey to the farthest reaches of the world and beyond to cut down the malevolent Fiends!

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.



1-4 player(s)
20KB Minimum

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements.
